story:
You get in the car. The stranger suddenly chains you up and says into a microphone:
"Chiesel. Chiesel this is Rob. This is Rob. 1 more slave to sell. Repeat, I have one more slave to sell,
yes, 31. I know, 31. We will brand a thirty-one on them as soon as we get there. This is Rob. Bye."
Do you struggle, struggle and scream, scream, or do nothing?
